verses.name: Acts 13:27
verses.text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem, and their rulers, because they knew him not, nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day, they have fulfilled them in condemning him.

verses.name: Acts 13:28
verses.text: And though they found no cause of death in him, yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain.

verses.name: Acts 13:29
verses.text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him, they took him down from the tree, and laid him in a sepulchre.

verses.name: Acts 13:30
verses.text: But God raised him from the dead:
